name: honeydew
content:
honeydew noun
(STICKY SUBSTANCE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] a sticky substance similar to honey, left on leaves by some types of insect

honeydew noun
(FRUIT)
[ C or U ] (also honeydew melon) a type of melon (= large fruit with a thick skin) that has white, green, or yellow skin and sweet, pale green flesh with a lot of juice: He made a refreshing fruit salad from honeydew melon, kiwi fruit, and red grapes. Use a melon baller to make 16 balls of honeydew melon.
Tobias Titz/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesI prefer canteloupes to honeydew melons.Honeydew melon with Parma ham is a classic combination for a starter.Honeydew is so deliciously sweet and cooling on a hot day.
